      • comparePassword

        public boolean comparePassword(String password,
                               HashedPassword hashedPassword,
                               String unusedName)
        Description copied from interface: EncryptionMethod
        Check whether the given hash matches the clear-text password.
        Specified by:
        comparePassword in interface EncryptionMethod
        Specified by:
        comparePassword in class HexSaltedMethod
        Parameters:
        password - The clear-text password to verify
        hashedPassword - The hash to check the password against
        unusedName - The player name to do the check for (sometimes required for generating the salt)
        Returns:
